home.empty_description_1: Load your first medical document to get started.
home.empty_description_2: Coheara will help you understand your health records.

profile.caregiver_mode: I'm setting this up for someone I care for
profile.password_too_short: Password must be at least 6 characters
profile.wrong_password_recovery: Wrong password. If you forgot it, use your recovery phrase.
profile.forgot_password: I forgot my password â€” use recovery phrase

chat.description_1: I can help you understand your medical documents.
chat.description_2: Ask me anything about your prescriptions, lab results, or health records.
chat.stream_error_guidance: Check that Ollama is running, then try sending your message again.
chat.conversation_start_error: Could not start a conversation. Please try again.

import.heading: Import Documents
import.description: Import lab results, prescriptions, imaging reports, or clinical notes. Coheara will extract and organize the information.
import.supported_formats: Supports PDF, JPEG, PNG, TIFF, and text files
import.receive_description: Scan a QR code to send documents from your phone
import.ai_analysis_note: AI analysis may take a minute per document.
import.failures_note: {count, plural, one {# file} other {# files}} could not be processed.

review.confirm_error_guidance: Your corrections are saved locally. Try confirming again.
review.reject_error_guidance: Please try again. If this continues, go back to the home screen.
review.flagged_description: There {count, plural, one {is # field} other {are # fields}} I wasn't sure about. Would you like to check {count, plural, one {it} other {them}} first?
review.reject_heading: What would you like to do?
review.reject_description: Would you like to try again or remove this document?

settings.verify_explanation: This proves no internet connection is needed.

ai.looking_for_ollama: Looking for Ollama on your computer
ai.ollama_not_detected: Ollama is still not detected. Make sure it is installed and running.
ai.ollama_local_description: Coheara uses Ollama to run AI models locally on your computer. Your data never leaves your machine.
ai.install_download: Download Ollama from {link} and run the installer.
ai.install_windows_note: After installing, start Ollama from your Start Menu.
ai.install_macos_download: Download from {link} or install with Homebrew:
ai.install_macos_note: After installing, open Ollama from Applications.
ai.install_linux: Run this command in your terminal:
ai.waiting_for_ollama: Waiting for Ollama... checking every 10 seconds.
ai.choose_model: Choose a model for medical document analysis:
ai.download_note: First download may take several minutes depending on your connection.
ai.verify_failed: Model responded but verification failed. Try pulling the model again.
ai.first_run_note: First run may take longer as the model loads into memory.
ai.change_model_hint: You can change models anytime in Settings → AI Engine.
ai.without_ai: Without AI: You can still import documents, track medications, and use the journal. AI features like document analysis and chat require Ollama.
ai.ollama_needed: Coheara needs Ollama to run AI models locally on your computer. Install Ollama and start it, then come back here.
ai.no_model_description: Pull a model below to enable AI features.
ai.no_models_empty: No models installed. Pull one from the recommendations below.
ai.delete_active_warning: This is your active AI model. Coheara will switch to the next available model.
ai.nonmedical_description: {name} is a general-purpose model. It may be less accurate for medical document analysis than a medical-trained model.
ai.nonmedical_privacy: Your data remains private and secure regardless.

backup.heading: BACKUP & RESTORE
backup.restore_password: Enter the password for {name} to decrypt the backup.
backup.password_guidance: Check that the password matches the one used when creating the backup.

error.connection_failed: Could not connect. Please try again.
error.password_length: Password must be at least 6 characters

trust.benefit_local: Your medical documents are never sent anywhere.
trust.benefit_private: No accounts, no tracking, no data collection.
